role_dependencies: Install cloudflared and systemd service for DNS-Over-HTTPS
role_description: An Ansible role that automates the process of installing PiHole with Cloudflared (encrypted DNS).
role_description_full_overview: [Pi-hole](https://pi-hole.net/) is a Linux network-level advertisement and Internet tracker blocking application which acts as a DNS sinkhole and optionally a DHCP server, intended for use on a private network. It is designed for low-power embedded devices with network capability, such as the Raspberry Pi, but supports any Linux machines.
